basic_info.description: 👋 I am a computer engineer who is constantly improving myself in the field of frontend and always eager to learn new skills. I took part in various projects with React Js and Vue Js developed myself most in this area.

projects.description: Automotive Insights is a project that provides analytical tools for agencies in the automotive sector. It offers a useful dashboard to its users with features such as data analysis and personnel performance management.
projects.title: Automotive Insights

projects.description: Marinzon is an e-marketing site that provides sales of ship products. I had the opportunity to develop new features of this website from the beginning.
projects.title: Marinzon

projects.description: Remigo is a platform where clients and real estate agents can talk to each other and perform various transactions with listings. In this project, I took part as a Frontend developer in a team that develops real estate website with Vue Js, Javascript, Quasar and Pinia on the Frontend side
projects.title: Remigo

projects.description: In this project, I took part as a Frontend developer in a team that develops customer-based customizable insurance products with React Js, TypeScript and Material UI on the Frontend side.
projects.title: Insurance Portal

projects.description: In this project, I took part as a Frontend developer in a team that develops products for a French company related to rubble recycling with React Js, Next Js and Typescript on the Frontend side. By using the Styled component, I gained experience that I did not have before on the style side. I also gained new experience with Nx, the build system with monorepo support, and the pnpm package manager.
projects.title: BigBagnGo

projects.description: In this project, I took part as a Frontend developer in the team that developed a product where CTOs around the world can communicate with each other with Vue Js, Nuxt Js and Wordpress on the Frontend side. It was a project where Wordpress and Nuxt Js pages were used together. I have been involved in developing static pages on the WordPress Elementor side and developing Nuxt js pages.
projects.title: Global CTO Forum
